  3. C.I.V.A

Sohee

Chaekyung

Introduction

C.I.V.A was a three-member fictional project girl group created for the mockumentary show The God of Music 2 in 2016.They released their debut digital single titled "Why" on July 8, 2016.

The group's name is because C is better than D on the report card, so they strive to be better than divas. However, it cannot be pronounced as a single word because it sounds like a curse word in Korean.

disbanded
